punto.Bienvenido: Welcome to the academic institution query area. This platform allows you to access different university services and departments.
punto.Instrucciones: Usage instructions: To select any area, simply click on the corresponding card. If you need additional assistance, use the read aloud button to repeat this information.
punto.title: Student Point Area

Lobby.title: Welcome, I'm InA
Lobby.Descripcion: Your virtual assistant for queries about Duoc UC. How can I help you today?
Lobby.VolverText: Returning to general area. Here are the general frequently asked questions:
Lobby.FAQareas: Here are the general frequently asked questions:
Lobby.FAQTitle: Here are the frequently asked questions for
Lobby.FAQDesc: Here you can choose the frequently asked questions for the areas of:

Preguntas.FAQ2: How can I enroll in an academic program at Duoc UC?
Preguntas.FAQ3: Where can I renew my TNE?

Asuntos.title: Natalia Varela Mu√±oz
Asuntos.correo_pronunciacion: n varela m @ duoc dot c l
Asuntos.Descripcion: The Student Affairs area aims to accompany, guide and support students during their training process, promoting their comprehensive development in both academic and personal spheres. Among its main tasks are planning and executing extracurricular activities aimed at strengthening student leadership, developing communication skills and acquiring study strategies that favor successful academic performance.
Asuntos.Descripcion2: Likewise, the area coordinates various Student Support Strategies, such as providing information and guidance on institutional benefits, School Accident Insurance, and procedures related to the National Student Card (TNE).
Asuntos.Descripcion3: Another relevant area is the connection with Career Advisors, promoting active participation, student representation and collaborative work.
Asuntos.FAQ2: How do I get my TNE?
Asuntos.FAQ3: How do I renew my TNE?
Asuntos.FAQ4: How do I get my TNE if it's lost or damaged?
Asuntos.FAQ5: What are the requirements to apply for the Emergency Program?
Asuntos.FAQ6: What are the application categories for the Emergency Program?
Asuntos.FAQ7: When can I apply for the Emergency Program?
Asuntos.FAQ8: How can I get information about Student Support Programs?

Desarrollo.title: Claudia Cort√©s
Desarrollo.correo_pronunciacion: c cortes n @duoc dot c l
Desarrollo.Desctitle: Guidance and tools for your professional development:
Desarrollo.Descripcion: The Labor Development and Graduates area is responsible for enhancing employment insertion and continuous professional growth of the community. We offer comprehensive and specialized support that accompanies users from their training stage to their positioning in the labor market.
Desarrollo.Descripcion2: ‚Ä¢ CV Advisory: Review and optimization of your CV to professionally highlight your skills, experience and achievements.
Desarrollo.Descripcion3: ‚Ä¢ Job interview tips: Practical guidance to confidently face selection processes and interviews.
Desarrollo.Descripcion4: ‚Ä¢ Professional LinkedIn support: Guide to create and maintain an attractive profile that reflects your personal brand and expands your job opportunities.
Desarrollo.Descripcion5: ‚Ä¢ Student Assistant Management: Coordination and support of students who help their peers in academic and professional development.
Desarrollo.Descripcion6: ‚Ä¢ Duoc Laboral management (students): Assistance in connecting with job opportunities and professional internships within the Duoc UC ecosystem.
Desarrollo.Descripcion7: ‚Ä¢ CDP Management - Professional Development Center: Coordination of activities, advisory services and programs aimed at strengthening your employability and career development.
Desarrollo.FAQTiltle: Frequently Asked Questions - Professional Development and Graduates
Desarrollo.FAQ1: What is Labor Development at Duoc UC?
Desarrollo.FAQ2: How can you help me improve my CV?
Desarrollo.FAQ3: Do you offer job interview simulations?
Desarrollo.FAQ4: Where can I access the Duoc UC Job Bank?
Desarrollo.FAQ5: How do I create my CV on duoclaboral.cl?
Desarrollo.FAQ6: What type of employability workshops does the campus offer?
Desarrollo.FAQ7: What benefits do graduates have in Labor Development?
Desarrollo.FAQ8: What email or person can I contact at the Plaza Norte campus?
Desarrollo.FAQ9: What support do you provide for finding professional internships?

Bienestar.title: Adriana Vasquez
Bienestar.correo_pronunciacion: a vasquez m @duoc dot c l
Bienestar.Descripcion: The Student Welfare Area focuses on developing activities and providing support to strengthen mental health and comprehensive well-being of students. The main associated programs are: Mental Health, Conscious Nutrition, Prevention of Alcohol and Drug Use, Student Coexistence and Inclusion.
Bienestar.Desctitle: Main supports provided by the Student Welfare Area
Bienestar.Descripcion2: ‚Ä¢ Free Virtual Psychological Care: Duoc UC students can access free virtual psychological care through eventos.duoc.cl. This benefit allows access to up to eight annual sessions with specialized professionals.
Bienestar.Descripcion3: ‚Ä¢ OPS Line - Psychological Emergencies (228203450): Free telephone number available 24 hours a day, every day of the week, where students can receive immediate support during a psychological and/or emotional crisis. Calls are answered by professionals trained to provide containment and support in emergency situations.
Bienestar.Descripcion4: ‚Ä¢ Mental Health Ambassadors Course: Free virtual course for students and staff, aimed at strengthening emotional support skills and providing tools to accompany others in difficult personal moments.
Bienestar.Descripcion5: ‚Ä¢ Weekly Virtual Talks on Well-being and Mental Health: Various virtual talks open to Duoc UC students are offered, addressing topics related to psychological, emotional and general well-being, with the purpose of promoting healthy habits and strengthening mental health.
Bienestar.Descripcion6: ‚Ä¢ Workshops and In-person Talks: Activities developed in sections or auditoriums, in coordination with career directors, aimed at promoting comprehensive well-being, healthy coexistence, mental health and prevention of alcohol and drug use, among other relevant topics for the student community.
Bienestar.FAQ1: What mental health supports exist at Duoc UC?
Bienestar.FAQ3: What should I do if I have a crisis or feel unwell while on campus?
Bienestar.FAQ4: I tried to schedule psychological care, but I can't find available appointments
Bienestar.FAQ5: How many psychological sessions can I have per year?
Bienestar.FAQ6: Can the virtual psychologist provide medical leave?
Bienestar.FAQ7: What can I do if I know a classmate is going through a difficult time but doesn't want to ask for help?
Bienestar.FAQ8: Is there any support for students with disabilities?
Bienestar.FAQ9: I started the Ambassadors course, but I can't advance to the next module
Bienestar.FAQ10: How do I know if I finished the Ambassadors course?
Bienestar.FAQ11: Do I have any additional responsibility after completing the Ambassadors course?

Deportes.title: Cesar Pino
Deportes.correo_pronunciacion: c pino n @duoc dot c l
Deportes.correo2_pronunciacion: n leiva s @duoc dot c l
Deportes.Descripcion: The Sports and Physical Activity Area promotes healthy living, comprehensive well-being and student participation through various sports and recreational activities.
Deportes.Descripcion2: ‚Ä¢ Management and coordination of workshops and sports disciplines for students.
Deportes.Descripcion3: ‚Ä¢ Administration of the CAF (Physical Conditioning and Well-being Center), space dedicated to physical training and healthy habits.
Deportes.Descripcion4: ‚Ä¢ Organization of BIM Workshops (Comprehensive Well-being in Movement) and interventions in common spaces to promote coexistence and university life.
Deportes.Descripcion5: ‚Ä¢ Guidance on sports alternatives, scholarships, representative teams and practice spaces.
Deportes.Descripcion6: ‚Ä¢ Intersede Tournaments: Competitions between campuses in various sports disciplines.
Deportes.Descripcion7: ‚Ä¢ Duoc UC Olympic Games: National meeting that brings together students from across the country, promoting teamwork and sports spirit.
Deportes.Descripcion8: The CAF, located on level -1, is open to all students who wish to train and improve their well-being. After an initial evaluation, they can attend twice a week and have the guidance of a physical trainer.
Deportes.FAQTiltle: Frequently Asked Questions - Sports and Physical Activity Area
Deportes.FAQ1: What sports workshops do you have?
Deportes.FAQ4: What happens if I miss one or more workshops?
Deportes.FAQ6: How do I enroll in Sports Electives?
Deportes.FAQ9: How can I enroll in the gym (CAF)?
Deportes.FAQ10: Can I go at any time?
Deportes.FAQ11: If I have free time and there are no teachers, can I use the gym?

Pastoral.title: Camila Celedon
Pastoral.Descripcion: The Pastoral Area of Duoc UC seeks to promote personal and community encounter with Jesus Christ throughout the community. Its mission is to accompany the faith life of students, teachers and staff, integrating faith with daily work.
Pastoral.Descripcion2: Camila is a Pastoral Manager, working together with Father Luck Jamb and Sister Rut Gallardo.
Pastoral.Descripcion3: The Eucharist is established as the center and summit of the pastoral experience and Christian life.
Pastoral.Descripcion4: It offers means for a full sacramental and spiritual life, through prayer spaces and sacrament celebrations.
Pastoral.Descripcion5: The area constitutes itself as a living Christian community within Duoc UC, seeking to be witnesses of Christ and transform society.
Pastoral.Descripcion6: It organizes service activities and service to others such as summer and winter Solidarity Missions as well as monthly apostolates.
Pastoral.Descripcion7: It seeks to increase Catholic faith through dialogue between faith and culture.
Pastoral.Descripcion8: It actively participates in the formation of people with a clear ethical-Christian identity.
Pastoral.Descripcion9: Its work drives the community to discover the meaning of their lives and to live the values of the Gospel.
Pastoral.Descripcion10: In summary, Pastoral is the area that animates the faith life and spiritually accompanies the Duoc UC community.
Pastoral.FAQ1: What sports workshops do you have?
Pastoral.FAQ4: What happens if I miss one or more workshops?
Pastoral.FAQ6: How do I enroll in Sports Electives?
Pastoral.FAQ9: How can I enroll in the gym (CAF)?
Pastoral.FAQ10: Can I go at any time?
Pastoral.FAQ11: If I have free time and there are no teachers, can I use the gym?
